item.description:
Saturday, November 13th, meet at South Bay Plaza, at 9:15 KSU at 9:30 AM
Head thru Franklin Park...to routes . 1 to 109 to 16 into Douglas, MA.
Then head south via Rt.98 into RI, pick up routes 102 to 138 to 114 to 136 back into MA. take routes 118 to 140 to Bay St/Rd then back onto Rt. 138 go thru the Blue Hills and then our separate ways. (I will cont. to Furnacebrook Parkway up Quincy Shore Drive)

We will go thru Newport, RI and the Newport/Jamestown Bridge is a toll road. There isn't any super slab on this route, but we can make changes if for any reason ???

Nothing is etched in stone, but that is the basic tour.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the parking area by Bank of America
item.name: South West Loop
